ch.aplu.robotsim

Class Target

  • java.lang.Object
    • Actor
      • ch.aplu.robotsim.Target

  • public class Target
extends Actor
    Class to represent a target detectable by the ultrasonic sensor.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Target(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bi, java.awt.Point[] mesh)
      Creates a target from given buffered image.
      Target(java.lang.String imageName, java.awt.Point[] mesh)
      Creates a target from given image file using the given mesh points.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Target

        public Target(java.lang.String imageName,
              java.awt.Point[] mesh)
        Creates a target from given image file using the given mesh points. The coordinate system for the mesh is centered in the middle of the image with pixel coordinates x to the right and y to the bottom.
        Parameters:
        imageName - the image to be used as target
        mesh - the mesh points (at least 2)

      • Target

        public Target(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bi,
              java.awt.Point[] mesh)
        Creates a target from given buffered image. The coordinate system for the mesh is centered in the middle of the image with pixel coordinates x to the right and y to the bottom.
        Parameters:
        bi - the image to be used as target
        mesh - the mesh points (at least 2)
